title: There's good reason to believe that GTA 6 will release next year
description: (But like every other big game, it could take longer than expected.)

title: I asked a ChatGPT-powered Skyrim companion to solve the game's easiest puzzle, and it almost got me killed
description: Bleak Falls Barrow contains Skyrim's first and easiest puzzle. But ChatGPT kept flunking it and nearly got me poisoned to death.

title: Doom co-creator John Carmack is headlining a 'toxic and proud' sci-fi convention that rails against 'woke propaganda'
description: Carmack heads the list of "guests" at the upcoming event that bills itself as a sci-fi convention for people "tired of woke propaganda."

title: One of Destiny 2's legendary weapons was doing 40% extra damage for weeks and nobody noticed
description: Bungie also detailed a slew of exotic buffs in a preview of changes coming next season.

title: BlizzCon is coming back as an in-person event in November
description: Blizzard's big show is headed back to Anaheim.

title: Early MMOs came up with the most painful game mechanic of all time, and it's somehow still in use today
description: I'm still traumatized by games that put me in XP debt for dying.

title: This Fable-inspired hybrid of RPG and farm sim is trying to cram in combat, crafting, and commerce
description: Mirthwood reintroduces itself with a long list of features.

title: Google will start deleting inactive accounts if they haven't been used in two years
description: And some tips on how to keep those accounts from being nuked.

title: Greedventory is like Dark Souls meets Monkey Island, and it's out now
description: The dark-humoured point-and-clicky twist on the Souls-like is out now.

title: Star Wars Jedi: Survivor gets a new patch on PC today
description: Patch 5 takes on another handful of PC-specific issues, and dozens more multiplatform problems.

title: When beat 'em ups were practically unheard of on PC, this 1993 rebel broke all the rules
description: The Japanese PC-98 was a system for RPGs, visual novels and shmups until Edge punched out its own path.

title: I seduced Joe Biden easily in Steam's newest dating sim, then he said I was too old for him
description: Biden my time for some malarkey and wine.

title: AMD is quietly smashing Intel in the mobile chip game
description: The new Dragon Range CPUs are top gaming laptop chips and its Phoenix APUs are in a class of their own.

title: Diablo 4 is proof that your in-game fashion doesn't have to be huge or complex
description: It may be limited, but Diablo 4 doesn't need a gigantic wardrobe to work well.

title: Here's how to catch all the reveals at this June's PC Gaming Show
description: We've got 55 games, over 15 brand new announcements, the best hosts in the biz, and some computerised assistance. What could go wrong?

title: Hit zombie survival game Doomsday: Last Survivors shambles to PC
description: Fight and build for survival in this hit colony builder set in the zombie apocalypse.

title: Nicolas Cage is coming to Dead by Daylight, don't ask why
description: Not the bees!

title: How do you move your MMO character, and are you doing it wrong?
description: Hint: You're probably doing it wrong.

title: Hands-on test: Philips Evnia gaming peripherals
description: Philips let me touch its upcoming gaming accessories in an RGB dungeon, manned by a sassy, dancing robot.

title: Five Nights at Freddy's movie gets first trailer after 8 years of rumours, restarts, and leaks
description: Yup, that looks like FNAF to me.

title: EU passes the world's first regulatory framework for crypto
description: Satoshi Nakamoto does not approve of this message.

title: Crusader Kings 3's Tours & Tournaments DLC looks like a minor expansion but is actually one of the series' best, and close to essential
description: New adventures await.

title: Sega would like $70, please
description: Company executives are hinting that its biggest games will get a price bump soon.

title: Microsoft president clarifies EU cloud agreement, popular games will be 'automatically' licensed to competitors and 'this will apply globally'
description: This is what got the Activision Blizzard deal over the line with EU regulators.

title: Notoriously litigious haptics company tries to shakedown Valve
description: Immersion Corporation has been described as a "patent troll".

description: Starting with the Dead Space remake.

title: Today's Wordle hint and answer #697: Wednesday, May 17
description: Today's Wordle: Help with the #697 puzzle.

title: Fast food chain Wendy's is planning to trial an AI chatbot in place of human staff
description: Would you like fries with your fries?
